title: Add a new rescource
description: Are you a part of, or do you know of a resource that should be a part of the map? Fill out this form and we'll get in touch with you or simply just add it to the map!
meta: this short text is optional if above description is short enough. should be no longer then 155 characters long. usd for google seacg results
helper: If you press the button above we'll collect the data you have submitted and use it solely for this map. Please do not share any sensitive data, and contact us if you want us to remove or change anything with your submission via marja.kristine.reibo.gundersen@tromso.kommune.no

inputs.label: Latitude
inputs.name: latitude
inputs.helper: to get longitude and latitude find yourself at any map app, right click and fill in the coordinates here. center of our map: latitude: 56.1573840, longitude:10.2007413

multiselects.label: Visible Tags
multiselects.name: tags
multiselects.helper: Visible tags should only be around three, and not more than five. Use them to describe your resource. They can be searched for and shown to help give context and more specific information.

multiselects.label: Hidden Tags
multiselects.name: invisible
multiselects.helper: These tags wont be visible anywhere, but will be shown i search results. Try to limit them to five tags.

textAreas.label: How can you use this ressource?
textAreas.name: howtouse

howtouse.label: How can you use this ressource?
